description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省榆林市的一所中学。
description.en: A middle school located in Yulin, Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、政治人物，陕甘宁边区政府副主席。
description.en: Chinese educator and politician, vice-chairman of the Shaan-Gan-Ning Border Region government.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，陕北红军和苏区创建人之一。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, one of the founders of the Shaanbei Red Army and Soviet Area.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，长期统治陕北地区。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who ruled northern Shaanxi for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的先进青年的群团组织。
description.en: A mass organization for advanced youth led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军陆军中将。
description.en: A Lieutenant General in the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员和革命活动家。
description.en: An early member and revolutionary activist of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，革命烈士。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and a revolutionary martyr.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国西北军将领，西安事变发动者之一。
description.en: A general of the Northwestern Army of the Republic of China and one of the instigators of the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1928年中国共产党在安徽北部设立的临时特别委员会。
description.en: The temporary special committee established by the Chinese Communist Party in northern Anhui in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 1928年4月由中国共产党在安徽阜阳领导的武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising led by the Chinese Communist Party in Fuyang, Anhui in April 1928.

description.zh-cn: 阜阳暴动后成立的苏维埃政权。
description.en: A Soviet government established after the Fuyang Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在土地革命战争时期创建的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces created by the Chinese Communist Party during the Agrarian Revolutionary War.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北平市（现北京市）的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Beiping (now Beijing).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期位于北平的一所监狱，关押过许多中共党员。
description.en: A prison in Beiping during the Republic of China era, where many CCP members were incarcerated.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的派出机构，负责领导华北地区党的工作。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, responsible for leading party work in North China.

nodes.id: 山西省牺牲救国同盟会

zh-cn: 山西省牺牲救国同盟会

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期在山西成立的抗日群众组织。
description.en: An anti-Japanese mass organization established in Shanxi during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1939年底阎锡山发动的旨在打击中国共产党领导的山西新军的事件。
description.en: An incident launched by Yan Xishan at the end of 1939 aimed at attacking the Shanxi New Army led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 山西青年抗敌决死队的下属部队之一。
description.en: One of the subordinate units of the Shanxi Youth Anti-Japanese Dare-to-Die Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民革命军第八路军的三个主力师之一。
description.en: One of the three main divisions of the Eighth Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训学校。
description.en: A training school for officials directly under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期进行的一次大规模的政治运动和思想改造运动。
description.en: A large-scale political and ideological remolding movement conducted by the Chinese Communist Party during the Yan'an period.

nodes.id: 陕甘宁晋绥联防司令部

zh-cn: 陕甘宁晋绥联防司令部

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，中国共产党领导下的军事指挥机构。
description.en: A military command organization under the leadership of the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安召开的全国代表大会，确立毛泽东思想为党的指导思想。
description.en: The national congress of the Chinese Communist Party held in Yan'an, which established Mao Zedong Thought as the party's guiding ideology.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Chinese Communist Party in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在本溪市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Benxi City.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在辽东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Liaodong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在唐山市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Tangshan City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省唐山市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Tangshan City, Hebei Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国第一机械工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一机械工业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的部门，主管机械工业。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the machinery industry.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间，由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆造成严重灾难的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China from 1966 to 1976, launched and led by Mao Zedong, which caused severe disasters.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的简称，是中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: Abbreviation for the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, the central leading body of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国陕西省榆林市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yulin City, Shaanxi Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都和直辖市。
description.en: The capital and a municipality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李力果出生于陕西米脂。
description.en: Li Liguo was born in Mizhi, Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 李力果是李鼎铭的次子。
description.en: Li Liguo is the second son of Li Dingming.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，在陕西榆林中学读书。
description.en: In 1923, he studied at Yulin Middle School in Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 李力果受到父亲李鼎铭影响，参加学生运动。
description.en: Influenced by his father Li Dingming, Li Liguo participated in the student movement.

description.zh-cn: 李力果与刘志丹等一起发动了反对军阀井岳秀的罢课斗争。
description.en: Li Liguo, along with Liu Zhidan and others, initiated a strike against the warlord Jing Yuexiu.

description.zh-cn: 李力果与刘志丹等一起发动了反对军阀井岳秀的罢课斗争。
description.en: Li Liguo, along with Liu Zhidan and others, initiated a strike against the warlord Jing Yuexiu.

description.zh-cn: 1926年加入中国共产主义青年团。
description.en: Joined the Communist Youth League of China in 1926.

description.zh-cn: 1927年随第十九军高桂滋部参加北伐。
description.en: In 1927, he participated in the Northern Expedition with the 19th Army under Gao Guizi.

description.zh-cn: 1927年在安徽太和县转为中共党员。
description.en: Became a CCP member in Taihe County, Anhui in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 魏野畴是李力果加入中国共产党的介绍人之一。
description.en: Wei Yechou was one of the sponsors for Li Liguo to join the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 张友清是李力果加入中国共产党的介绍人之一。
description.en: Zhang Youqing was one of the sponsors for Li Liguo to join the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1928年担任中共皖北临时特委委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the CCP Northern Anhui Temporary Special Committee in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 在1928年4月的阜阳暴动中，李力果负责组织赤卫队及农民协会的工作。
description.en: During the Fuyang Uprising in April 1928, Li Liguo was responsible for organizing the Red Guards and farmers' associations.

description.zh-cn: 阜阳暴动后，于4月9日成立了皖北苏维埃政府。
description.en: After the Fuyang Uprising, the Northern Anhui Soviet Government was established on April 9.

description.zh-cn: 阜阳暴动后，任皖北苏维埃政府副主席。
description.en: After the Fuyang Uprising, he served as the Vice Chairman of the Northern Anhui Soviet Government.

description.zh-cn: 阜阳暴动失败后，奉中共组织指示抵达北平，进入北京大学。
description.en: After the failure of the Fuyang Uprising, he was instructed by the CCP organization to go to Beiping and enter Peking University.

position.zh-cn: 委员、常务委员、宣传部部长
position.en: Committee Member, Standing Committee Member, Head of Propaganda Department

description.zh-cn: 1930年任中共北平市委委员、常务委员，下半年至11月任宣传部部长。
description.en: In 1930, he served as a member and standing committee member of the CCP Beiping Municipal Committee, and as the head of the Propaganda Department from the second half of the year to November.

description.zh-cn: 1936年冬，经中共北方局地下党营救出狱。
description.en: In the winter of 1936, he was rescued from prison by the underground party of the CCP Northern Bureau.

relationships.target: 山西省牺牲救国同盟会

position.zh-cn: 组织训练委员会负责人、组织部部长
position.en: Head of the Organization and Training Committee, Head of the Organization Department

description.zh-cn: 1937年初任山西省牺牲救国同盟会组织训练委员会负责人，11月后任组织部部长。
description.en: In early 1937, he served as the head of the Organization and Training Committee of the Shanxi Sacrifice National Salvation League, and became the head of the Organization Department after November.

position.zh-cn: 副纵队长、政治委员、政治部主任
position.en: Deputy Column Commander, Political Commissar, Director of Political Department

description.zh-cn: 1940年2月，任决死队第四纵队副纵队长，后改任第四纵队政治委员、政治部主任、军政委员会成员。
description.en: In February 1940, he served as the deputy commander of the 4th Column of the Dare-to-Die Corps, and was later reappointed as the political commissar, director of the political department, and a member of the military and political committee of the 4th Column.

description.zh-cn: 在十二月事变中，参与第四纵队与晋绥军的作战。
description.en: During the December Incident, he participated in the combat of the 4th Column against the Jin-Sui Army.

position.en: Head of the Organization Department of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 1940年至1941年，担任八路军第120师政治部组织部部长。
description.en: From 1940 to 1941, he served as the Head of the Organization Department of the Political Department of the 120th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，赴延安中央党校学习。
description.en: In 1942, he went to the Central Party School in Yan'an to study.

description.zh-cn: 李力果参加了1942年开始的延安整风运动。
description.en: Li Liguo participated in the Yan'an Rectification Movement that began in 1942.

relationships.target: 陕甘宁晋绥联防司令部

description.zh-cn: 1943年任陕甘宁晋绥联防司令部秘书长。
description.en: In 1943, he served as the Secretary-General of the Shaan-Gan-Ning-Jin-Sui Joint Defense Command.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 作为晋绥代表团成员出席中共七大。
description.en: Attended the 7th National Congress of the CCP as a member of the Jin-Sui delegation.

description.zh-cn: 1945年11月至1946年2月，任中共本溪市委书记。
description.en: From November 1945 to February 1946, he served as the Secretary of the CCP Benxi Municipal Committee.

position.zh-cn: 委员、秘书长、民族部部长、常委
position.en: Committee Member, Secretary-General, Head of Nationalities Department, Standing Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 1946年1月至12月任中共辽东省委委员、秘书长兼省委民族部部长。5月至12月任常委。
description.en: From January to December 1946, he served as a member, secretary-general, and head of the nationalities department of the CCP Liaodong Provincial Committee. From May to December, he served as a standing committee member.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月至1956年3月，任唐山市市长。
description.en: From March 1950 to March 1956, he served as the Mayor of Tangshan City.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月至1956年3月，任中共唐山市委书记。
description.en: From March 1950 to March 1956, he served as the Secretary of the CCP Tangshan Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国第一机械工业部

description.zh-cn: 1956年10月至1959年5月，任国务院第一机械工业部副部长。
description.en: From October 1956 to May 1959, he served as the Vice Minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期，已逝世的李力果被诬陷为叛徒，其墓碑被损毁。
description.en: During the early stage of the Cultural Revolution, the deceased Li Liguo was falsely accused of being a traitor, and his tombstone was destroyed.

description.zh-cn: 1978年12月，中共中央为李力果平反并恢复其名誉。
description.en: In December 1978, the Central Committee of the CCP posthumously rehabilitated Li Liguo and restored his reputation.
